privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Lingola Stories Kids adopts child privacy and data security as a core principle. This policy explains how your personal data is collected, stored, and protected.
privacyPolicy.section1sub1Body:
‚Ä¢ Nickname or profile name.
‚Ä¢ Email address (for parent account and support).
‚Ä¢ Age information (for content suitability).
‚Ä¢ Language level, stories read, and learned words.

Note: This data is never used for health or psychological analysis.
privacyPolicy.section1sub2Body: Device type, operating system, and app performance data are collected. Precise location data is NOT collected; only approximate location (country/city) is gathered.
privacyPolicy.section2Body:
Your data is used solely to:

‚Ä¢ Provide safe and age-appropriate content.
‚Ä¢ Personalize the learning experience.
‚Ä¢ Improve app performance.
‚Ä¢ Fulfill legal obligations.
privacyPolicy.section3Body: Data is stored as long as your account is active or as required by law. Support records are kept for a maximum of 12 months. When an account is deleted, personal data is irreversibly erased.
privacyPolicy.section4Body: Under GDPR and LPPD (KVKK), parents have the right to request access, correction, deletion, or portability of data. Please send requests to support@fly-work.com.
privacyPolicy.section5Body: Lingola Stories Kids is designed for ages 6+. Parental consent is required for users under 13. Accounts with false age declarations will be closed immediately.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: Welcome to Lingola Stories Kids! This policy explains what digital helpers are used and for what purposes they are utilized when you use the app.
cookiePolicy.important: IMPORTANT: Lingola Stories Kids adopts child privacy as a core principle. Our app is designed for users aged 6 and above.
cookiePolicy.section1Title: 1. WHAT ARE COOKIES AND SIMILAR TECHNOLOGIES?
cookiePolicy.section1Body: Cookies and similar technologies (SDKs, identifiers) are small digital components that help the app function correctly. These technologies do not directly identify you and do not create individual profiles for advertising.
cookiePolicy.section2Body:
Strictly Necessary Technologies
Required for session management and security controls. The app may not function properly without these components.

Performance and Analytics
Helps us understand which stories are read and which areas need improvement. Data is evaluated anonymously.

Personalization
Remembers settings like language preference and reading level to provide a tailored experience for the child.
cookiePolicy.section3Title: 3. WHY DO WE USE THESE TECHNOLOGIES?
cookiePolicy.section3Body:
‚Ä¢ To ensure the app runs safely and smoothly.
‚Ä¢ To make the reading experience more fluid.
‚Ä¢ To remember repetitive settings.
‚Ä¢ To identify features for future development.
cookiePolicy.section4Body: We apply the "minimum data usage" principle when working with third-party partners. These providers are subject to their own privacy policies.
cookiePolicy.section5Body: Parents can limit the use of these technologies via device settings. However, disabling necessary technologies may affect functionality.

q1.question: What is the purpose of this app?
q1.answer: It helps children learn English through fun stories. Words are seen in context, learned intuitively, and reinforced through repetition.

q2.question: What does the AI do here?
q2.answer: It analyzes which words the child struggles with, provides simple explanations, and suggests new stories appropriate for their level. The content is adapted to the child's learning pace.

q3.question: How much time is enough to use it daily?
q3.answer: 5‚Äì10 minutes a day is sufficient. Even a short story is effective for regular learning.

q4.question: What age group are the stories suitable for?
q4.answer: The stories are presented according to the child's age and level. The app determines the level at the beginning and adjusts the difficulty based on progress.

q5.question: How does the child learn unfamiliar words?
q5.answer: When the child taps on an unfamiliar word, its meaning, a simple explanation, and the correct pronunciation are shown. This way, the word is both read and heard.

q6.question: Is an internet connection required?
q6.answer: Previously downloaded stories can be read offline. An internet connection is required for new content and updates.

q7.question: Is the app free?
q7.answer: Basic stories are available for free. More stories, advanced personalization, and additional features are offered in the premium package.

q8.question: Can the stories be listened to?
q8.answer: Yes. The stories can be listened to with correct pronunciation. This way, both reading and listening skills develop together.

q9.question: Can the learned words be tracked?
q9.answer: Yes. The learned words are recorded and planned to be repeated at certain intervals. This way, forgetting can be reduced.

q10.question: How long does it take to see progress?
q10.answer: With regular use, progress can be noticeable in a short time. As reading habits increase, vocabulary and comprehension skills improve.
